meanings.definition: A child of one's uncle or aunt.
meanings.sent1: My cousins and I played together at the family reunion.
meanings.sent2: I have many cousins because my mom has a big family.
meanings.sent3: My cousins always make me laugh with their silly jokes.
meanings.sent4: Our family tree branches out with cousins scattered all around.
meanings.sent5: The bond between cousins is special and unique.

meanings.definition: A relative descended from a common ancestor.
meanings.sent1: My cousins and I share the same grandparents.
meanings.sent2: Family gatherings are always lively with cousins around.
meanings.sent3: My cousins and I are like a mini family reunion wherever we go.
meanings.sent4: The family resemblance is strong among us cousins.
meanings.sent5: Cousins connect the past to the present in our family history.

meanings.definition: A person or thing related or analogous to another.
meanings.sent1: In nature, bees and wasps are considered cousins.
meanings.sent2: The two companies are business cousins, sharing similar goals.
meanings.sent3: The two cars looked like cousins with their matching colors.
meanings.sent4: The two recipes are culinary cousins, both using similar ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The two novels are literary cousins, exploring similar themes.
